ValidationRule.description: When Job Outcome = Rescue No Longer Required, then an Outcome Reason must be included.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(animalos__Job_Outcome__c, "Rescue No Longer Required"), ISBLANK(TEXT(Outcome_Reason__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When Job Outcome = Rescue No Longer Required, then an Outcome Reason must be included.
